name: mira
text: Poor Scrambles. I wonder if he ever found his way home.

name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by NeoNaoNeo, ralgnar, RedJoker)

name: jamers
text: Thing again. http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/europe/4489792.stm

name: deimosrising
text: This is just more anti-squirrel propaganda. What was the last news article you saw about dogs killing squirrels? You think that never happens? PSH

name: charchar
text: It is truly the shame of the nation.

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by BPMead, sardoniclaconic, RedMange, willt, diplomat76, morbo)

name: rowboat
text: This got me at first, but then I remembered that Todd is up on his cautionary folk tales. Scrambles? His name is Ruin.

name: rowboat
text: Oops. Bring on the lames.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by johnnybaverage, HassanOLeary, Robot_Satan, cmjhogan, hcaz, farqussus, milkpants, aHatOfPig, ravindra108, jawsh, I_Love_Kate)

name: rowboat
text: ha ha ha

name: farqussus
text: what a douche

name: saint
text: Man, he hates me so much.

name: johnnyrocker
text:
Asshole-being aside, I think that this is most people's worst fear.
Not being loved OR hated, not even being noticed.

name: rowboat
text: Thankfully, saint never had to worry about not being hated.

name: saint
text: I know what to expect.

name: rowboat
text: I'm honestly happy that you're still lurking around back here in the archives. Is it cool if I continue making a big deal about hating you even though I've long since forgotten what you did that pissed me off in the first place? At this point, it's kinda like goin' back and firing up Excitebike or Kid Icarus or some shit. It's comforting.

name: saint
text: I'm there for you, Rowboat. There for you to hate because it's what you've always done, like senior citizens voting republican.

name: mockereo
text: this was sorta a touching exchange i stumbled upon. In a weird, weird way.

name: blitztrug
text: yeah, i really liked this

name: camrock
text: Speciesism aside, Todd is a loathesome little shit and rabies would probably improve him.

name: c_dizzle
text: Todd's natural enemy is actually compassion.

name: jhunt
text: Seriously, you do NOT want a piece of that.

name: abe
text: Todd got rabies from sharing his points, and AIDS from a raccoon bite.

name: chaesar
text: He got AIDS from fucking, and he got rabies from fucking, rabies is like a feral animals' version of HPV. Yes that was an HPV joke.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by TheGrouch, blastradius, tttt2, UgliestSong, estutius, keithcozz, colorlessness, I_Love_Kate, philosophe)

name: philosophe
text: I wil be a man and apologize for giving you a lame. I thought you either stole the quote from comments or reposted it from the "Todd fucks his way thin" strip but then I checked and it's something RB says in that strip. Mea culpa.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Your honesty earns you a chubby, friend. Now go and sin no more.

name: i_love_kate
text:
If it helps, I lamed you for repeating a line from a different strip and only altering a single word. A change that no more contextualised the quote than it did improve the humour of it.

So, chubby for honesty?

name: rowboat
text:
Quote:
...I lamed you for repeating a line from a different strip and only altering a single word.


If this is your policy, you've got your work cut out for you.

name: i_love_kate
text: But I just love it so gosh darn much.

name: heyman
text: he kept from getting all these things by not givin' a shit

name: nurdbot
text: Wow. How did he convince a Raccoon to bite him, that is the real question. Todd must be like the sort of guy who bathes with the coming of seasons.

name: ambala
text: I like his little backpack.

name: zapatos
text: It really is just so damn cute.

name: jackerouac
text: And I'm suppoused to be all happy, cuz he's....uh..wearing a backpack (Swingers reference. I do think that backpack is sick)

name: mortshire
text: i'm crying, i'm crying.

name: nexus
text: But he's so thirsty, Todd :(

name: gournal
text:
Hopefully it will cheer everyone up that 2 days ago my boyfriend found a dog wandering by a gas station with no nametag, all alone (and probably so thirsty) and now he is lying on top of my feet :) He is fluffy and fat and kind of looks like a bear but a little smaller.

Also I tried to name him MelonFarmer like I'd always dreamed. My boyfriend said that we would call him Mel for short, but yeah I'm never going to.

name: gournal
text: Bad news- the owner claimed it yesterday and when I went to her house and gave it back to her I found out its name was "Bacardi Blue"

name: dusty
text: I was going to say that sounds like good news till I got to the end.

name: huber
text:
we need a todd t-shirt

don't you all agree?

name: deancain29
text: Onstad - you have the power to make this man-mountain (me) cry.

name: malyan
text: A comment left by malyan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, jrpigman, twentyfivepast, Unfun, blacksheepboy, equinn2006, Semiquaver, milkpants, shoinan)

name: caduceo
text: you wrote a whole bunch about a cartoon dog malyan. You are insane. You are a crazy dude.

name: farqussus
text: look at the reaction this paragraph got. if they could see assetbar now.

name: andrew_
text: this analysis really doesn't deserve the amount of lames  it has accumulated.

name: deusoma
text: So, naturally, someone lames you for pointing that out. This is a strange place.

name: hyetal
text: This concept has taught me more about people than living with them ever could.

name: aaron_haynes
text:
One day there will be a comment that actually sucks you off while you read it.

It will have 437 chubbies and 1 lame.

name: shoinan
text:
The dog is dead. And it's all because Todd was a mean squirrel. Do you think Todd cares?

It raises the question though... does Scrambles get along with Blister?

name: spectre
text: Is this the dog that Ray took for $58 at poker? He seems the type.

name: peterjoel
text: No, I think that's more likely to be Onstad's dog

name: el_cameroni
text: You don't want to eat a squirrel that has the squirrel AIDS.  No, sir.

name: buttermoths
text: Nor if it has to take a dump real bad.

name: mrblank91
text: Lalala, I'm not reading comments about Scrambles death he survived and was reunited with his owners, not looking... In a happy place...

name: tbtabby
text: "Denial" rhymes with "smile!" :-D

name: gormster
text: This is the saddest thing.

name: crinklebat
text: Scrambles just breaks my heart. Oh god.

name: dasilodavi
text: A comment left by dasilodavi was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, orvel, mistlethrush)

name: orvel
text: A comment left by orvel was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, xiaomimi, dasilodavi, gnjdfsgk)

name: indiglow
text: Why yes, I do in fact remember seasons two through four.

name: theguitarhero
text: Yeah I was gonna say, THAT'S EVERY FUCKING EPISODE BRAH.

name: overmedicated
text: I believe on the Great Outdoor Fight wiki it turns out Scrambles ended up becoming Last Man Standing. i forget what year it was, mind, and no-one knew his real name.

name: panopticism
text: http://greatoutdoorfight.com/index.php/Cortez_Boyer

name: quarantine
text: The squirrel's nemesis is a dog

name: tekende
text: I thought this was kind of funny, and then the alt text made it hilarious.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: I love his little backpack. I will take you home, Scrambles! (or, as the alt text says, rejected names: Steven, Poopie, Dog)

name: rhadamanthus
text: Does anybody imagine Scrambles as sounding like the dog from Davey and Goliath, but a bit touched?

name: hellofyellin
text: I hear scrambles as the dog from the flea commercial, the one yellow lab puppy with the neckerchief.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: Fuck you I want to stab that entire commercial.

name: hellofyellin
text: You are a sad man with a hard heart.  Go to a dungeon.

name: jlynes
text:
It's definitely better than the lab puppy hawking toilet paper.

I'll take advice from a dog on how to wipe myself as soon as he stops eating out of the litter box.

name: farqussus
text: I was nearly convinced that eating my shit, throwing it up, and then licking up the chunky puddle was the best way to clean up poop. Damn that dog.

name: hamscout
text:
Indeed. And just for this strip, in my head, Todd's voice sounds like mc chris (the voice of 'mc pee pants'). He just keeps screamin' and screamin'...
Damn. It's like watching that guy from 'Man Bites Dog' scream that old woman into cardiac arrest...

name: fantomeciel
text: The bookbag is the clue to whether Scrambles is trying to eat Todd or actually lost.

name: littlefatdog
text: More Scrambles! Bring back Scrambles!

name: achilleselbow
text:
This strip is sad to the point that it makes me uncomfortable. The interesting thing is that the pathos of Scrambles' dialogue makes it clear that Onstad intended that very effect. I remember in one of Nathaniel West's stories there was a line about something being so cute that one is strangely compelled to hurt it - I think that applies here.

But seriously, the last line... he's not even talking to Todd anymore! The resignation just kills me.

name: nucleargeranium
text: Aww.

name: snowman
text: His little backpack!  Arrgh!

name: i_love_kate
text: It is very wrong that it is only now that I notice that the dog is in fact wearing a backpack. Silly me.

name: tagrineth
text: ..what's up with the dog that can talk normally and wear a backpack?  I guess Onstad must've originally meant for dogs to be intelligent.

name: tekende
text: The ability to speak does not make one intelligent.

name: norsef
text: Anyone else reminded of Mischief Makers looking at that dog? You just know Todd would throw down.

name: tekende
text: One time I ate this chicken and it was killed before it had a chance to take a dump, that was a nasty dinner

name: rumblefish
text: Ugh. What the hell man? Some of us are eating breakfast here. Dammit.

name: lolsworth
text: THIS is the saddest thing. In fact it is genuinely painful. This strip made me hate Todd forevermore.

name: theirateturk
text: I always wondered how eating a whole animal worked, what with the eating of the unpooped faeces and whatnot

name: salvar
text: This is my favorite strip.

name: nice-on-water
text: Todd's being a tit.

name: betwixt
text:
TODD!!
never be a dick to strangers!

name: puguglypress
text: "Holy frikkin' cripes!" is exactly what I thought when I first saw that weirdly-drawn dog in Achewood.
